text: Wisdom Calls
Does not wisdom call,
and understanding raise its voice?
⸤Atop the heights⸥\f + \fr 8:2 \ft Literally “At a head of the heights” \f* beside the road,
at the crossroads she stands.
Beside gates, before towns,
\add at the\add* entrance of doors, she cries out:
“To you, O ⸤people⸥,\f + \fr 8:4 \ft Literally “men” \f* I call,
and my cry is to the children of humankind.
Learn prudence, O simple ones;
fools, learn ⸤intelligence⸥.\f + \fr 8:5 \ft Literally “heart” \f*
Listen! For noble things I will speak,
and upright things from the opening of my lips.
My mouth will utter truth,
and wickedness \add is\add* an abomination to my lips.
All sayings of my mouth \add are\add* in righteousness;
none of them are twisted and crooked.
All of them are straight to him who understands,
and upright to those who find knowledge.
Take my teaching and not silver;
may you choose knowledge rather than choice gold.
For wisdom is better than jewels,
and all desires shall not compare with her.
I, wisdom, live with prudence,
and I find knowledge and discretion.
The fear of Yahweh \add is\add* hatred of evil,
pride, and arrogance and an evil way.
And I hate a mouth of perversity.
⸤Advice and sound judgment⸥\f + \fr 8:14 \ft Literally “To/for me are advice and sound judgment” \f* are mine;
I am understanding, ⸤strength is mine⸥.\f + \fr 8:14 \ft Literally “to/for me is strength” \f*
By me kings reign,
and rulers decree righteousness.
By me rulers rule,
and nobles—all judges of righteousness.
I love ⸤those who love me⸥,\f + \fr 8:17 \ft Literally “her lovers” \f*
and those who seek me diligently shall find me.
Fortune and glory \add are\add* with me,
enduring wealth and righteousness.
My fruit is better than gold,\f + \fr 8:19 \ft Literally “fine gold” \f* even refined gold,
and my yield than choice silver.
In the way of righteousness I walk,
in the midst of paths of justice,
\add in order\add* to endow those who love me \add with\add* wealth,
and I will fill their treasuries.
Wisdom at Creation
“Yahweh possessed\f + \fr 8:22 \ft Or “gained,” or “acquired” \f* me, \add the\add* first of his ways,
before his acts ⸤of old⸥.\f + \fr 8:22 \ft Literally “from before” or “from then” \f*
From eternity, I was set up from \add the\add* first,
from the beginning\f + \fr 8:23 \ft Hebrew “beginnings” \f* of the earth.
When there were no depths, I was brought forth,
when there were no springs of ⸤abounding⸥\f + \fr 8:24 \ft Literally “made heavy” \f* water.
Before mountains had been shaped,
before hills, I was brought forth.
When he had not yet made earth and fields,
or the first dust of the world,
⸤when he established⸥\f + \fr 8:27 \ft Literally “in his establishing” \f* the heavens, there I \add was\add*,
⸤when he drew⸥\f + \fr 8:27 \ft Literally “in his drawing” \f* a circle upon the face of the deep,
⸤when he made⸥\f + \fr 8:28 \ft Literally “in his making” \f* skies from above,
when he founded fountains of the deep,
⸤when he assigned⸥\f + \fr 8:29 \ft Literally “in his assigning” \f* his limits to the sea,
that waters shall not transgress his ⸤command⸥,\f + \fr 8:29 \ft Literally “mouth” \f*
⸤when he marked⸥\f + \fr 8:29 \ft Literally “in his marking” \f* the foundations of the earth,
I was ⸤beside⸥\f + \fr 8:30 \ft Literally “at the place of” \f* him, a master workman,
and I was delighting day by day,
rejoicing before him ⸤always⸥,\f + \fr 8:30 \ft Literally “in all \fq of \ft time” \f*
rejoicing in the world of his earth,
and my delight \add was\add* with the children of humankind.
Benefits of Following Wisdom
“And now, children, listen to me;
happy \add are\add* those who will keep my ways.
Hear teaching and be wise;
do not neglect \add it\add*.
Happy \add is the\add* person who listens to me,
\add in order\add* to keep watch at my doors day by day,
\add in order\add* to guard the frames of my entrances.
For he who finds me \add is\add* he who finds\f + \fr 8:35 \ft Hebrew “those who find” \f* life,
and he obtains favor from Yahweh.
But he who misses me injures himself.\f + \fr 8:36 \ft Or “soul,” or “inner self” \f*
All those who hate me love death.”
